items.name: TC_55!039 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

TC_55!012 | Sign up/log in/forms or the transition to the trading platform are not opened after clicking the [Try now] button in 'Why choose Capital.com?..' Block in the menu item [Our Mobile Apps]
TC_55!024 | Testing link [Learn more about us] on the block 'Contents'
TC_55!058 | Not possible to vote for another trading instrument in the block 'What is your sentiment...' if on another page voted for another instrument
TC_55!029 | The Trading platform overview page not open when button [Platform overview] click on the 'Investmate app' page
TC_55!034 | The footer is missing on click menu item [Professional] of the menu section [Ways to trade]
TC_55!022 | Testing button [Google Play] on the block 'CFD trading app'
TC_55!065 | The Trading Guides page is not opened after clicking the link [Handelsleitfäden] (trading guides) on the page [Demo-Konto] (Demo Account) in DE lang
TC_55!090 | The modal window "Confirm Form Resubmission" is not opened after clicking the button [Back] on any article from search page.
